data.name: app_min_1
data.value: Application window will be minimized 1 second before recording starts.

data.name: auto_ask
data.value: Sequential encoding autorun is enabled. Do you want to keep this setting?

data.name: auto_ask2
data.value: Multi-file encoding autorun is enabled. Do you want to keep this setting?

data.name: batch_concat_msg
data.value: Batch concatenation is enabled, but no initial or end files were selected. Please choose either one of them or disable this setting.

data.name: capt_virtual
data.value: To capture audio playback, virtual audio driver is required.

data.name: check_web_up
data.value: Would you like to visit the project web site to check for new releases?

data.name: concat_vid_help
data.value: This filter allows to join videos with different qualities, it improves compatibility but it requires audio and video to be re-encoded. Parameters field can be left blank. NOTE: Only video files allowed.

data.name: demuxer_help
data.value: In this mode audio/video files can be stream copied, provided they share qualities (size, codec, bitrate). NOTE: Not all containers are supported for stream copy. If playback issues occur or files are not joined, re-encoding may be required.

data.name: dest_not_empty
data.value: Destination folder is not empty. Continue?

data.name: dif_in_out_f
data.value: Different input folders to single output folder

data.name: down_prog
data.value: Download is in progress, please abort before closing window.

data.name: down_p_ab
data.value: Download is in progress. Do you want to force quit?

data.name: drop_big
data.value: Dropped file is too big. Only text files under 1 MB are supported.

data.name: error_writing
data.value: Error writing to destination folder. Please select another path, or ensure you have write permissions.

data.name: err_pl_vlc
data.value: Error trying to play URL with VLC:

data.name: err_save_qu
data.value: There was an error saving queue file.

data.name: err_test_temp
data.value: Test folder could not be created at TEMP location.

data.name: ext_com_err
data.value: External command returned an error on

data.name: files_long_t
data.value: files can take a long time. Are you sure?

data.name: lang_corrupted
data.value: Language configuration was corrupted, please reinstall application.

data.name: one_track
data.value: Please select only one file to add its streams.

data.name: outf_count
data.value: Downloading. Total count not available. Output folder count:

data.name: pr02
data.value: Video: Convert audio track to AAC HQ 2 channels

data.name: pr03
data.value: Video: Convert audio tracks to AC3 2 channels

data.value: Video: Convert to H264 HQ + Source Audio

data.value: Video: Convert to H265 HQ + Source Audio

data.value: Video: Rotate 90 degrees Clockwise to H264 + Source audio

data.value: Video: Rotate 90 degrees CountercLockwise and Vertical Flip to H264 + Source audio

data.value: Video: Rotate 90 degrees CounterClockwise to H264 + Source audio

data.value: Video: Rotate 90 degrees Clockwise and Vertical Flip to H264 + Source audio

data.value: Video: Rotate 180 degrees to H264 + Source audio

data.name: pr16
data.value: Audio: Convert to MP3 VBR HQ 2 ch embedded cover

data.name: pr17
data.value: Audio: Convert to MP3 VBR HQ 2 ch

data.name: pr18
data.value: Audio: Convert to MP3 CBR HQ 2 ch

data.name: pr20
data.value: Subtitle: Extract first subtitle track to SRT

data.name: pr22
data.value: Record screen at 24 fps + Audio AAC to MKV

data.name: pr23
data.value: Record screen at 15 fps 1280x720 + Audio to MKV

data.name: pr24
data.value: Record screen at 30 fps Nvidia NVENC + Audio AAC to MKV

data.name: pr25
data.value: Record screen at 25 fps Intel QuickSync + Audio AAC to MKV

data.name: pr26
data.value: Join images at 1920px width to MP4 video

data.name: quick_yt2
data.value: - Go to YouTube channel main url, and click on VIDEOS tab.

data.name: quick_yt3
data.value: - Copy the url and paste on channel field.

data.name: scsr_term
data.value: Screen capturing terminated unexpectedly. File may be truncated.

data.name: sort_status
data.value: Please sort and check file list for items marked with status

data.name: source_not_deleted
data.value: Source files that could not be deleted due to failed encoding or file in use:

data.name: stop_any
data.value: You can stop recording by pressing Control-Shift-P at any time.

data.name: too_many_files
data.value: Too many files to be parsed

data.name: try_scr_pr
data.value: Try with a screen capture preset and check encoding parameters.

data.name: undef_dur_all
data.value: Processing will not continue after items with undefined duration (infinite).

data.name: warn_down
data.value: There were warning messages during queue download:

data.name: vids_unav
data.value: (Some videos maybe be unavailable, and live streaming events are skipped.)

data.name: warn_sp
data.value: Available space on destination drive is less than 500 MB, application may crash during encoding. Do you want to abort the current operation?

data.name: pr21-2
data.value: Video: Encode AMD-VCE H264 HQ + Source Audio

data.name: pr21-21
data.value: Video: Encode AMD-VCE HEVC HQ + Source Audio

data.name: add_excl_ws
data.value: Add exclusion for ffmpeg in Windows Security

data.name: admin_cmd
data.value: You will be requested for admin rights by command prompt.

data.name: attempt_exc
data.value: This feature attempts to add an exclusion to Windows Security for current ffmpeg.exe.

data.name: check_not_st
data.value: FFmpeg.exe MD5 checksum is not stored yet.

data.name: excl_added
data.value: Exclusion added to Windows Security. You can review it on next screen.

data.name: md5_fail1
data.value: FFmpeg.exe MD5 checksum is not matching stored value. The file may have been corrupted or hacked.

data.name: md5_not_match
data.value: Current MD5 checksum does not match stored value. Please click on Trust current ffmpeg before adding an exclusion.

data.name: md5_trust
data.value: If you replaced it recently you can consider it trusted on Security settings.

data.name: only_1011
data.value: Automatic exclusion only supported in Windows 10/11

data.name: req_w1011
data.value: This automatic feature requires Windows 10/11. You may manually add a security exclusion in your antivirus software.

data.name: tip1
data.value: This application launches ffmpeg processes for encoding, muxing and demuxing, obtaining streams, etc.

data.name: tip2
data.value: Some antivirus software scans every ffmpeg process launched because it is not digitally signed . This can reduce performance for operations like reading and filtering streams, obtainins thumbnails , etc.

data.name: tip3
data.value: If you experience sluggish performance, you can improve it by adding an exclusion to

data.name: tip4
data.value: The included ffmpeg.exe in the application is safe and MD5 checksum is validated on every startup.

data.name: not_amf
data.value: may not work with selected AMD amf encoder.

data.name: not_nvenc
data.value: may not work with selected NVIDIA nvenc encoder.

data.name: not_qsv
data.value: may not work with selected Intel QuickSync encoder.

data.name: md5_reinst
data.value: Otherwise it may have been modified and the application should be reinstalled.

data.name: img_copied
data.value: Image was copied to the clipboard.

data.name: ansi_rec
data.value: ANSI or UTF without BOM text encoding is recommended.

data.name: non_eng_rec
data.value: NOTE: Non-english characters in source filename may cause duration to be missing in ANSI format.

data.name: not_sup_bom
data.value: may not be supported by ffmpeg if it contains BOM (Byte order marker).

data.name: vs_files_warn
data.value: In Avisynth scripts, non-english characters in source filename may cause duration to be missing in non UTF/Unicode encodings.

data.name: kf_no_a
data.value: Trackbar keyframe navigation may not not be available. You can still use the time buttons.

data.name: speed_not comp
data.value: Speed setting is not compatible with other video filters.

data.name: del_overw2
data.value: In order to allow enabling file overwriting and delete source at simultaneously, delete source settings are now set to: Send to recycle bin and Delete one by one.

data.name: warn_sort
data.value: NOTE: Do not add new files or folders during the multi-file encoding, as some of them may remain queued and not being processed if this setting is enabled.

data.name: warn_run_enc
data.value: Settings 'Do not warn about already encoded files' and 'Skip encoded files' have been enabled too.

data.name: warn_colon
data.value: Filename or path contains an unsupported character for concatenation: ' (single quote).

data.name: warn_colon2
data.value: Please rename file(s) or path(s) accordingly before proceeding.

data.name: err_crop
data.value: An error occurred creating crop preview. Please check size/coordinate parameters do not exceed video boundaries.

data.name: crop2
data.value: A crop filter was found in parameters field. Please ensure to remove any previous -vf crop instance.

data.name: err_size
data.value: Error obtaining file resolution. Cropping preview cannot be displayed.

data.name: vf_crop_multi
data.value: Another video filter instance was found in parameters field. You can use multiple filters, between brackets and separated by commas. Please modify -vf filter accordingly.

data.name: to_tray2
data.value: Application was minimized to system tray icon

data.name: warn_n_files
data.value: Adding thousands of files can take a few minutes for each file to be parsed. You can enable Quick file listing at settings to speed up file adding, but no progress information will be displayed, only Success/Failed item status and log information.

data.name: warn_n_files2
data.value: Do you want to continue? You can cancel file adding at any time.

data.name: quick_f_m
data.value: Quick file listing dramatically improves file loading time, but it comes with some constraints:

data.name: quick_f_m2
data.value: Total remaining time is not available, and total progress displays only the encoded files count.

data.name: quick_f_m3
data.value: Custom columns are not stored, but you can add them later.

data.name: quick_f_m4
data.value: File features (duration, size) are only guessed during encoding. If they are available, individual progress is displayed. If not, only success/error status will be displayed at the end.

data.name: quick_f_m5
data.value: Two pass encoding wizard cannot be used.

data.name: quick_f_m6
data.value: Fade in/out is not supported when quick file listing is enabled.

data.name: multiple_inst
data.value: Another application instance is already running. Multiple instances can cause unexpected behaviours. Continue?

data.name: ren_chars1
data.value: Incompatible characters [,'] for ffmpeg filter found in filename. Those filenames could cause errors.

data.name: ren_chars2
data.value: Would you like to rename them replacing conflicting characters?

data.name: sunset1
data.value: Sunset time cannot be later than sunrise.

data.name: trim_fade_n
data.value: Fade in/out is only compatible with Start/End trimming mode.

data.name: filter_quick_not
data.value: This feature cannot be used with Quick File listing enabled.

data.name: on_battery2
data.value: Encoding is set to pause on battery and resume on AC power. Would you like to disable this setting and force resume queue processing?

data.name: quick_zero_no
data.value: This feature cannot be used with Quick File listing enabled.

data.name: enc_not_sup1
data.value: Selected encoder is not supported by your current ffmpeg.exe version.

data.name: enc_not_sup2
data.value: You can try an updated full version at Settings -> Search for other ffmpeg versions.

data.name: hw_ff_1
data.value: Encoding performance with hardware video encoders can vary depending on your ffmpeg.exe version.

data.name: Hw_ff_2
data.value: If you experience poor performance, check for latest ffmpeg git master builds at gyab.dev (Available at application Settings) to replace current ffmpeg.exe version.

data.name: mon_no_rel
data.value: A relative main path cannot be used with subfolders monitoring, please use an absolute path.

data.name: mon_path_equal
data.value: Monitored folder and main output path are the same. Please select another destination path at main tab, or use a relative output path.
